item.title: CVE-2018-10843|2024-08-05T07:46:46.958Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- source-to-image
item.description: source-to-image component of Openshift Container Platform before versions atomic-openshift 3.7.53, atomic-openshift 3.9.31 is vulnerable to a privilege escalation which allows the assemble script to run as the root user in a non-privileged container. An attacker can use this flaw to open network connections, and possibly other actions, on the host which are normally only available to a root user.
